title: Big Cypress National Preserve: Off-Road Vehicle Advisory Committee
body: Off-Road Vehicle Advisory Committee       The Off-Road Vehicle Advisory Committee was established pursuant to the Preserve's 2000 Recreational Off-Road Vehicle Management Plan and the Federal Advisory Committee Act of 1972 to examine issues and make recommendations regarding the management of off-road vehicles within the national preserve. The establishment of the Committee fulfills the requirements of the Recreational Off-Road Vehicle Management Plan and is consistent with the National Park Service policy of civic engagement. The Committee is comprised of individuals representing a broad range of backgrounds, knowledge, and skills. All meetings are held at: Big Cypress Swamp Welcome Center 33000 Tamiami Trail East Ochopee, FL 34141 2015 Meeting Calendar Meetings are from 3:30 to 8:00 pm on the following dates: * Tuesday, October 20 Committee Members Franklin Adams * John Adornato * Brendan Barry * Ed Carlson * Brad Cornell * David Denham  Mike Duever * Edwin Everham * Manley Fuller * Karl Greer * Jorge Gutierrez * Chuck Hampton  Wayne Jenkins *  Barbara Jean Powell *  Dennis Wilson  The Committee operates under a charter and agreed-upon protocols. You may submit comments or meeting agenda item requests to the Committee for their consideration.
